## Description {#details}

Thin wrapper around a block for SSA Updater interface.

Necessary because we need to track the PHI value(s) that we may have observed as necessary in this block.

Definition at line 3919 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/livedebugvalues/instrrefbasedimpl-cpp">InstrRefBasedImpl.cpp</a>.
